backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, blob storage, access control, and custom order submission with admin‑restricted order retrieval.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old custom order format to the new schema, adding new fields and mapping renamed ones.
feature_evidence.json: Report detailing implemented features, associated source files, components, and confidence levels for product updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their structure, purpose, and implemented features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining color tokens, themes, base styles, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon assets, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with routes for all product and collection pages using the shared site layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component showing brand info, Instagram and email links, metadata, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper combining TopNav, page content, and footer into the app’s main structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive top navigation bar with logo, desktop links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable Section and SectionHeader components providing consistent spacing, animations, and typography.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for submitting and fetching custom orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, dark mode settings, animations, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/catalogImageMap.ts: Centralized mappings and helper functions for catalog and product image paths.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/BookmarkCollectionPag: Page displaying the bookmark collection with product image, pricing card, and feature list.
frontend/src/pages/BouquetCollectionPage: Displays bouquet types with images, tiers, and pricing, plus a separate pipe cleaner bouquet section.
frontend/src/pages/CustomizedCardCollect: Shows customized card pricing, preview image, and occasion categories with icons.
frontend/src/pages/CustomOrdersPage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting custom orders with file uploads, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/FramesMemoryKeepsakes: Lists polaroid and album products with images, descriptions, and pricing options.
frontend/src/pages/HandcraftedCuteEssent: Renders a grid of cute essential item images with a brief handcrafted description.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring category navigation, tagline, and value propositions.
frontend/src/pages/PolaroidCollectionPag: Renders the Polaroid Collection page showing print sizes and bouquet products with pricing and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, requirements, image editing rules, and existing feature records for the DESVA product website.
